results.name: a(n) = A002487(n-1) OR A002487(n), where OR is bitwise-or (A003986).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
formula: a(n) = A002487(n-1) OR A002487(n), where OR is bitwise-or (A003986).
mathematica: a[0] = 0; a[1] = 1; a[n_] := If[EvenQ@ n, a[n/2], a[(n - 1)/2] + a[(n + 1)/2]]; Table[BitOr[a[n - 1], a@ n], {n, 120}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 22 2017 *)
program: (Scheme) (define (A283986 n) (A003986bi (A002487 (- n 1)) (A002487 n))) ;; Where A003986bi implements bitwise-OR (A003986).
xref: Cf. A283973 (positions where coincides with A007306, equally, with A283987).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 21 2017
